m_descr: Control window drives for optimal temperature regulation, ventilation and security
max_wind_helper: Will close windows if max wind speed is reached. Windows are only partially opened when the wind speed aproaches the threshold
min_temperature_outside_helper: Will not open windows if the outside temperature falls below this level.
rain_sensor_helper: Sensor to detect rain. Will close windows if rain is detected
temperature_outside_sensor_helper: A temperature weather data widget may be used instead of a physical device
thermostat_device_helper: A thermostat module to set the desired temperature. If none is seelcted, this module will create a virtual thermostat
wind_sensor_helper: A wind weather data widget may be used instead of a physical device
